original_text: And he walked in the way of the kings of Israel, as did the house of Ahab: for the daughter of Ahab was his wife: and he did evil in the sight of the Lord.
korean_text: 그가 이스라엘 왕들의 길을 가서 아합의 집과 같이 하였으니 이는 아합의 딸이 그의 아내가 되었음이라 그가 여호와 보시기에 악을 행하였으나

sentences.original_text: And he walked in the way of the kings of Israel
as did the house of Ahab
for the daughter of Ahab was his wife
and he did evil in the sight of the Lord
